a.title: Image of Sailboats on the Navesink River

img.alt: Image of Sailboats on the Navesink River

div.div: Important updates regarding the continued impacts of the current restrictions of COVID-19.
VIEW MORE About COVID-19 April 24, 2020 Update
VIEW MORE About COVID-19 April 17, 2020 Update

We are seeking your help in developing our new strategic plan for 2020-2025. We have created this survey as a follow-up to public input meetings to ensure that all valued members of the Fair Haven community have a chance to contribute.
Ms. Cheryl Romano is pleased to present the latest edition of the Curriculum and Instruction Newsletter.
VIEW MORE About Curriculum and Instruction Newsletter - March 2020
Pre-Registration for Kindergarten 2020-21 is now live! We are pleased to announce that for the 2020-21 school year we will offer a FULL DAY session.

The Fair Haven Schools are proud to present the results of our Spring 2019 State Testing Data. The results show that our students continue to do extraordinary well in the core content areas of Language Arts and Math. We hope you enjoy the presentation and please feel free to contact us with any questions you may have.
VIEW MORE About NJSLA Results Spring 2019

a.title: Referendum Approved by Fair Haven Voters

img.alt: Referendum Approved by Fair Haven Voters

div.div: Referendum Approved by Fair Haven Voters
Fair Haven voters approved a bond referendum to improve our school security, school facilities, and expand to Full-Day Kindergarten. Thank you for showing that #FHLeads!
VIEW MORE About Referendum Approved by Fair Haven Voters
The 2019-2020 School Calendar has been amended to make Tuesday, September 24th an early dismissal for all Sickles and Knollwood students.
VIEW MORE About 2019-2020 School Calendar Amended

We are so grateful for the support of our amazing PTA. Please enjoy this overview of the Fair Haven PTA and how it serves the Fair Haven community. For more information, please visit www.fairhavenpta.com.
VIEW MORE About Fair Haven PTA 2019
